metadata.title: CVE-2018-6192 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Artifex MuPDF 1.12.0, the pdf_read_new_xref function in pdf/pdf-xref.c allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation violation and application crash) via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: mupdf package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.15.0+ds1-1').
